en-US.settings.troubleshoot.title: ğŸ”§ Troubleshooting
en-US.settings.troubleshoot.denied.desc:

Find OmniAssistant and change to "Allow"
en-US.settings.troubleshoot.nomicrophone.desc:
Confirm your computer has a microphone connected
Check if microphone is enabled in system settings
en-US.settings.troubleshoot.network.desc: Check if your network connection is working properly
